MS MCQs

    Communicate effectively on GitHub by using Markdown

    »

    1. Which of the following Markdown snippets would produce this text: Hello, world!?

      Hello, *world!*

      Hello, world!

      Hello, world!


    2. How do you print certain characters, like asterisks (*) and underscores (_), literally on your output?

      Use three in a row, like *** or ___.

      Escape them with a backslash, like * or _.

      Unfortunately, this is not supported at this time.


    3. Suppose there is an HTML snippet that you want to include on your GitHub Pages web site, but Markdown doesn’t offer a way to render it. What should you do?

      Just add the HTML inline.

      Cut the content. If it’s not supported in Markdown, then it’s probably not worth including.

      Open an issue that requests Markdown support for your very specialized scenario.
